title: social object
description: Generic object on the web with a set of reactions

inReplyTo.description: The object that this object is in response to.
inReplyTo.note: This should also support replying to activities

comments.description: All the comments in response to this object

likes.description: All the likes in response to this object

attachedObjects.title: Related objects
attachedObjects.description: A collection of one or more additional, associated objects, similar to the concept of attached files in an email message. An object MAY have an attachedObjects property whose value is a JSON Array of Objects.

upstreamDuplicates.description: A JSON Array of one or more absolute IRI's [RFC3987] identifying objects that duplicate this object's content. An object SHOULD contain an upstreamDuplicates property when a publisher is knowingly duplicating with a new ID the content from another object. This MAY be used as a hint for consumers to use when resolving duplicates between objects received from different sources

downstreamDuplicates.description: A JSON Array of one or more absolute IRI's [RFC3987] identifying objects that duplicate this object's content. An object SHOULD contain a downstreamDuplicates property when there are known objects, possibly in a different system, that duplicate the content in this object. This MAY be used as a hint for consumers to use when resolving duplicates between objects received from different sources.
